trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> control with respect to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> that the control implements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 컨트롤에서 이 컨트롤이 구현하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />을 기준으로 눈금의 위치를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> 열거형은 설정 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 있는 아래에 있는 눈금 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>합니다.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 오른쪽 맨 아래에 속성이 설정 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above and below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> bar for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left and right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 눈금이 가로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 위쪽과 아래쪽에, 세로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 왼쪽과 오른쪽에 표시됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 눈금이 가로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 아래쪽에, 세로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 오른쪽에 표시됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: 눈금이 가로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 위쪽에, 세로 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> 왼쪽에 표시됩니다.
